member.name: M:Echo.Platforms.AsmResolver.Emulation.Values.DefaultCliMarshaller.Int8ToI4(Echo.Concrete.Values.ValueType.IntegerValue,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Converts the provided (partially) known 8 bit integer value to an I4 value.
member.param: The value to marshal.
Indicates whether the value is originally a signed or an unsigned integer.
member.remarks: This method implements the conversion rules for 8 bit integers to 32 bit integers as described in the ECMA-335 III.1.1.1, and therefore sign extends the value when the integer is signed. This also holds when the sign bit is marked unknown. In such a case, all the remaining 24 bits will be marked unknown.

member.name: M:Echo.Platforms.AsmResolver.Emulation.Values.DefaultCliMarshaller.Int16ToI4(Echo.Concrete.Values.ValueType.IntegerValue,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Converts the provided (partially) known 16 bit integer value to an I4 value.
member.param: The value to marshal.
Indicates whether the value is originally a signed or an unsigned integer.
member.remarks: This method implements the conversion rules for 16 bit integers to 32 bit integers as described in the ECMA-335 III.1.1.1, and therefore sign extends the value when the integer is signed. This also holds when the sign bit is marked unknown. In such a case, all the remaining 16 bits will be marked unknown.
